category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_initiate_process
preference.preference_description: Activates the process initiation performance transaction. This measures the elapsed time from the beginning of the operation to the insertion of the initial task into all target inboxes. Valid Values: * ON: Enables performance monitoring of the process initiation performance transaction. * OFF: Suppresses performance monitoring of the process initiation performance transaction.
